content: Promotion services in Trending and Most Visited on coinmarketcap.100% guaranteed. The best prices for services!Transactions through guarantors.For the first customer who leaves a review, I will make a discount.https://t.me/blackindustrihttps://cryptostar.agency/

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: stwmrucom on March 13, 2023, 06:15:02 PMPromotion services in Trending and Most Visited on coinmarketcap.100% guaranteed. The best prices for services!Transactions through guarantors.For the first customer who leaves a review, I will make a discount.For all questions, go here: https://t.me/i_SerStenWhat is the nature of the service? Are you a buyer of advertising space and want to resell it? Or do you provide a currency ranking service?Generally, buying back ad space may be against their terms of use.As for ranking service, it is unethical behavior, and your coin will not continue to be up.Anyway are you ready to use escrow service?

Payment is preferred through the guarantor of transactions.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: stwmrucom on March 15, 2023, 09:01:22 AMI offer services about the promotion of the coin so that it would get into the top 10 in the section https://coinmarketcap.com/trending-cryptocurrencies / or https://coinmarketcap.com/most-viewed-pages/I do not ask for 100% prepayment. Payment is preferred through the guarantor of transactions.I understand that you will do the promotion but only promotion won't let a coin reaches the top 10 section of the trending cryptocurrencies. Let's suppose someone develops a token but there is not enough volume in it so it won't reach CMC top trending coins no matter how much you promote n on social media.Do you have examples of which crypto projects you have successfully promoted to top lists in the recent past?

comments.author: stwmrucom
comments.body: Quote from: virasog on March 15, 2023, 10:35:52 PMQuote from: stwmrucom on March 15, 2023, 09:01:22 AMI offer services about the promotion of the coin so that it would get into the top 10 in the section https://coinmarketcap.com/trending-cryptocurrencies / or https://coinmarketcap.com/most-viewed-pages/I do not ask for 100% prepayment. Payment is preferred through the guarantor of transactions.I understand that you will do the promotion but only promotion won't let a coin reaches the top 10 section of the trending cryptocurrencies. Let's suppose someone develops a token but there is not enough volume in it so it won't reach CMC top trending coins no matter how much you promote n on social media.Do you have examples of which crypto projects you have successfully promoted to top lists in the recent past?Of course, the only requirement that is for the project to get into the Trending or Most Visited section is to have a trading volume of $1 million. It can be on CEX or DEX, it doesn't matter. We do everything else ourselves.I can't give examples because it's not quite right from an ethical point of view, these are personal agreements between me and the project, because disclosure of information can affect the project in different ways. I am always ready to work through the guarantors of transactions and potential clients do not risk anything working with me.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: stwmrucom on March 16, 2023, 07:12:48 AMOf course, the only requirement that is for the project to get into the Trending or Most Visited section is to have a trading volume of $1 million. It can be on CEX or DEX, it doesn't matter. We do everything else ourselves.I can't give examples because it's not quite right from an ethical point of view, these are personal agreements between me and the project, because disclosure of information can affect the project in different ways. I am always ready to work through the guarantors of transactions and potential clients do not risk anything working with me.That's perfectly fine that you cannot show the evidence as projects using your service won't like that they are exposed as how they got in trending but still i have some queries.As you said it takes a volume of $1 million to be on trend, what if there is less liquidity available for such new coins on a dex, so you will invest your million dollars to increase the trading volume  Secondly, what do you charge for this service as I don't think you can offer this service cheaply? Also, i think this service is not ethically right as you are generating fake volume to make a coin trending.

comments.author: stwmrucom
comments.body: Quote from: virasog on March 16, 2023, 03:57:16 PMQuote from: stwmrucom on March 16, 2023, 07:12:48 AMOf course, the only requirement that is for the project to get into the Trending or Most Visited section is to have a trading volume of $1 million. It can be on CEX or DEX, it doesn't matter. We do everything else ourselves.I can't give examples because it's not quite right from an ethical point of view, these are personal agreements between me and the project, because disclosure of information can affect the project in different ways. I am always ready to work through the guarantors of transactions and potential clients do not risk anything working with me.That's perfectly fine that you cannot show the evidence as projects using your service won't like that they are exposed as how they got in trending but still i have some queries.As you said it takes a volume of $1 million to be on trend, what if there is less liquidity available for such new coins on a dex, so you will invest your million dollars to increase the trading volume  Secondly, what do you charge for this service as I don't think you can offer this service cheaply? Also, i think this service is not ethically right as you are generating fake volume to make a coin trending.Trading volume does not depend on liquidity. The trading volume is always created by market makers (on dex, it can be an army of bots that buy and sell tokens among themselves). Therefore, you do not need $ 1 million for trading volume You're talking about ethics, but I can't completely agree with that. Many projects do this one way or another. I offer this service for those who are looking for it and are aware of such opportunities.The cost is discussed personally with a specific project. But it's not tens of thousands of dollars, so it can be compared with marketing costs. In the crypto industry, advertising is very expensive everywhere, and those who know how to use the marketing budget more efficiently and economically win.

comments.author: stwmrucom
comments.body: If you have an event, draw attention to it on the CMC.
